text: you know obsessed I am with these insane
milkshake well today I've got another
insane milkshake for you it's a s'mores
milkshake mmm yeah so to start off with
you want to get some broiled
marshmallows I'm doing it in the broiler
you could do it over an open flame if
you want to skewer three marshmallows on
a skewer this is for your garnish and
then have six more marshmallows just on
a baking sheet this you can sort of set
aside for a few minutes because you want
to do that just at the end - they're
nice and warm as the garnish but you can
get these into the broiler they need to
broil for about 30 seconds per side do
not walk away while you're doing this
they can catch on fire if you're not
careful all right now you can make your
milkshake the chocolate milkshake so
you'll need about 1 and 1/2 cups of
chocolate ice cream it's pretty close to
an entire pint but not completely okay
and then 1/3 to 1/2 a cup of milk so
I'll start with 1/3 of a cup
last time I made this I definitely need
the whole half but you never know
Hey
once it's all blended up get your
marshmallows that are already brown and
put them in and blend that done don't
overdo it build your shake a little bit
of hot fudge a little swipe of hot fudge
a little bit of vanilla ice cream I like
to have a scoop of ice cream in it sort
of cross between a sundae and a
milkshake
so get your scoop of vanilla in there
crumble some graham crackers on top
maybe one cracker per spoon some hot
fudge sauce on top of that pretty insane
before I fill the glass I'm going to go
get my garnish into the broiler because
I want them ready to eat now I can
finish if there's some chunks of
marshmallow even better don't fill your
glass all the way to the top because
what's gonna happen is you're gonna
finish doing this and you're gonna add
your whipped cream and it's gonna go all
over the place
trust me it's happened to me several
times top it with some stiffly beaten
whipped cream lightly sweetened usually
likes a lightly beaten but not in this
instance it's gonna overflow anyway I
can see it already happening of course
put your marshmallow garnish on top mmm
yummy take another graham cracker I like
to just dip the edge in a little bit of
the hot fudge sauce you don't have to do
that but I like to
yeah and then because it's supposed to
be over the top some more hot fudge
sauce and your s'mores milkshake is done
and look it didn't even overflow it is
divine it serves like I don't know eight
to ten I'm just kidding it serves like
one really enthusiastic milkshake eater
or two really loving friends enjoy your
crazy over-the-top s'mores milkshake
